EmailTemplate.description: Template to send Stubbins when On-Stop approval is requested
EmailTemplate.name: Stubbins Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Account On Stop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello
Account {!Account.Name} ({!Account.AccountNumber}) has requested a quote/booking and it's currently on stop.
Please check the account and confirm/reject the request
https://cs18.salesforce.com/{!Account.Id}
If replying via email you can also add comments on the second line. The comments will be stored with the approval request in Salesforce CRM.
Note: For salesforce.com to process your response the word APPROVE, APPROVED, YES, REJECT, REJECTED, or NO must be in the very first line of the reply email. Also, any comment must be in the second line.
